explanations.machine learning: The paper compares machine learning techniques (RFR, SVM, SGB) with multiple linear regression for soil property mapping.
explanations.supervised learning: The study uses supervised learning methods (RFR, SVM, SGB, MLR) where models are trained on labeled soil sample data.
explanations.regression: All models tested (MLR, RFR, SVM, SGB) are regression models predicting continuous soil property values.
explanations.support vector machine: SVM is explicitly mentioned as one of the four prediction models tested in the study.
explanations.SVM: Abbreviation for support vector machine, which is one of the main methods compared in the paper.
explanations.decision tree: Random forest regression (RFR) and stochastic gradient boosting (SGB) are ensemble methods based on decision trees.
